content:
Save the Einstein Case Recommendations in Your Flow

Add an Update Records action to save the ApplyCaseClassificationRecommendations case SObject output.

Einstein Case Classification is available in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions.
Setup for Einstein Case Classification is only available in Lightning Experience.
Click  to add an Update Records element.
Enter a label and optionally add a description.
For How to Find Records to Update and Set Their Values, select Use the IDs and all field values from a record or record collection.
Select the case output from your flow, e.g. {!MyApplyRecsAction.caseSObject}.
Click Done.

When triggered in a flow, case updates appear in the case feed. Agents must review and save Einsteinâ€™s recommendations manually.
title: Einstein Case Classification Recommendations in Service Cloud
